amendment.description: to create a reserve fund permit an increase in veteran's medical care that is fully offset with an assessment on excessive lawyer fees paid under the tobacco settlement.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2849 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2849 proposed by Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2678-2681; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2678-2679) to create a reserve fund permit an increase in veteran's medical care that is fully offset with an assessment on excessive lawyer fees paid under the tobacco settlement.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2849 proposed by Senator Kyl.
